alert.note: Alert for St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 13 at 4:59PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in St. Marys County. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one to one and a half feet above normal. High tides at Coltons Point, Point Lookout, and Piney Point are ongoing. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. St Marys River at Straits Point MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 1.9 ft, Major 3.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/03 PM 3.1 1.5 1.7 2.0 Minor 14/04 AM 1.9 0.3 0.6 1.0 None 14/03 PM 1.5 -0.1 0.2 2.0 None 15/04 AM 1.4 -0.2 0.1 0.5 None 15/05 PM 1.7 0.1 0.3 0.5 None 16/06 AM 2.2 0.6 0.8 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
